reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 894/93: MONEY FOR GRANTS AND TAX CREDITS
reg_info.reg_name_text: MONEY FOR GRANTS AND TAX CREDITS
reg_info.act_under: Small Business Development Corporations Act   Loi sur les sociétés pour l’expansion des petites entreprises

content.content: 1. For the fiscal year beginning on April 1, 1993, the amount of money available to be paid by way of grant under the Act is $1,945,550 and the amount of money available for tax credits under the Act is $80,580. O.Reg. 894/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the fiscal year beginning on April 1, 1993, the amount of money available to be paid by way of grant under the Act is $1,945,550 and the amount of money available for tax credits under the Act is $80,580. O.Reg. 894/93, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O.Reg. 894/93, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O.Reg. 894/93, s. 2.
